Hi,
        Iam familiar in writing testcases for bussiness objects using
JUnit and now iam trying to write the testcase for the servlets for
which iam making use of Cactus.I have set the path for
commons-cactus.jar.I have used import statements like...
import org.apache.commons.cactus.*;
import org.apache.commons.cactus.util.*;

Iam able to compile the java files while run time it is throwing the
following exception

java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError:
java.util.MissingResourceException: Can't find resource for base name
cactus, locale en_US
        at java.util.ResourceBundle.getBundle(ResourceBundle.java:423)
        at java.util.ResourceBundle.getBundle(ResourceBundle.java:339)
        at
org.apache.commons.cactus.client.AbstractHttpClient.<clinit>(AbstractHttpClient.java:82)

        at java.lang.FloatingDecimal.<clinit>(FloatingDecimal.java:1662)

        at
org.apache.commons.cactus.AbstractTestCase.runBare(AbstractTestCase.java:266)

I will be very grateful to you if you send me the solution asap

regards,
Sandhya Sree


--------------86721597A3ECCA157784935B
Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii

<br>Hi,
<br>        Iam familiar in writing
testcases for bussiness objects using JUnit and now iam trying to write
the testcase for the servlets for which iam making use of Cactus.I have
set the path for commons-cactus.jar.I have used import statements like...
<br><b>import org.apache.commons.cactus.*;</b>
<br><b>import org.apache.commons.cactus.util.*;</b>
<p>Iam able to compile the java files while run time it is throwing the
following exception
<p><b>java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError: java.util.MissingResourceException:
Can't find resource for base name cactus, locale en_US</b>
<br><b>        at java.util.ResourceBundle.getBundle(ResourceBundle.java:423)</b>

<br><b>        at org.apache.commons.cactus.client.AbstractHttpClient.<clinit>(AbstractHttpClient.java:82)</b>

<br><b>        at org.apache.commons.cactus.AbstractTestCase.runBare(AbstractTestCase.java:266)</b><b></b>
<p>I will be very grateful to you if you send me the solution asap
<p>regards,
